column5: ferb he's more of a man of action

is up to his old tricks

as always agent p it is imperative that your cover identity
as a mindless domestic pet remains intact
now get out there we're all counting on you
then we release the snakes during the corkscrew around the interstate
i'm gonna go get the snakes

so what's the emergency this time

aren't you a little young to be a rollercoaster engineer
well i must say i'm very impressed
the forms all seem to be in order

so if there's anything i can get you
do you think we could borrow one of those gadgets
have covered the entire eastern seaboard in tinfoil
and when i put my giant magnet
next to my ingenious magnetism magnifier
i will pull the east in a westerly direction
thereby reversing rotation of the earth

well let me just answer that by saying

most of the morning in the making
so who wants to go first
to fasten insert the tab into the metal buckle

i--i--i could buy a bunch of east-facing real estate
and sell it again with a muttering
now i you i are too late
quake in your boots and watch helplessly
thereby reversing rotation of the earth
and now we have a two ton ball of tinfoil
traveling two-hundred miles an hour directly at us
quickly we must separate the magnet from the magnifier
i always have it with me but my purse is such a disaster area
it's no use we are doomed
you saved us perry the platypus
what am i supposed to be looking at

it was right here and it was huge
time to go i've got frozen
are still under that stupid tree in the backyard right

funny i don't remember this in the blueprints

welcome to mr slushy burger may i take your order
anyone want a i croissant i

they're the only mammals to lay eggs

oh man i can smell the peanut butter
so what should we do tomorrow

like the i venus de milo i

she bears no resemblance to a
